quotes.quote: We would often be sorry if our wishes were gratified.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Dreams are wishes your heart makes.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Nothing is easier than self-deceit. For what each man wishes, that he also believes to be true.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: The easiest thing of all is to deceive one's self; for what a man wishes he generally believes to be true.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Great minds have purposes, others have wishes.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: If wishes would prevail with me, my purpose should not fail with me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Thy wish was father... to that thought.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Where nothing wants that want itself doth seek.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
